bibl.title: Letter from W.S. Leathers to Emilie Lawrence Reed, September 30, 1929

div1.p: Leathers thanks Emilie Lawrence Reed for the donation of Walter Reed's letter and Bible to the Vanderbilt University Museum of Medical History.

div1.head: Letter from W.S. Leathers to Emilie Lawrence Reed, September 30, 1929
div1.opener:
VANDERBILT UNIVERSITY
SCHOOL OF MEDICINE
NASHVILLE, TENNESSEE
September 30, 1929.
OFFICE OF THE DEAN
Dear Mrs. Reed:
div1.p:
May I take this opportunity to thank you for your
kind contribution to Dr. W. Groce Harrison for use
in the course on History of Medicine. We especially
appreciate your donation of the letter and the Span-
ish bible of your husband. If all of our friends
should act as graciously and take as real an inter-
est in our efforts, we would be assured of a fine
Museum of Medical History.
div1.closer:
Very sincerely yours, W. S. Leathers, M. D.,
Dean. Mrs. Walter Reed,
Blue Ridge Summit.
Franklin County, Penna.
